title: Battle Arena Toshinden [PC]
description:
This is Battle Arena Toshinden for the PC. Optimizations for modern PCs come with this version, though it's optional.

_______________

You are invited...to your own DEMISE. Battle the world's toughest fighters in this "Invitation Only" underworld journey. 

Only ONE warrior will survive. Will it be your destiny?

    * The very first true 3-dimensional, 360-degree tournament-style fighter on the PlayStation game console. Avoid and 

annihilate your opponent before he - or she - does you!
    * Four different views AT WILL. From in-your-face close to the sky-high gaze of the powers-that-be.
    * Sweep kicks, rapid-fire hits, sky-high jumps, #@%$! slaps, killer combos and tons of weapons and special moves.
    * GLORY! LOVE! REVENGE! DEATH! Pulverize 8 deadly challengers... AND whoever or whatever comes next!


***DOSBOX INCLUDED***


OPTIONAL:
_______________

PLAYSTATION VERSION HERE = http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4281132/Battle_Arena_Toshinden_1.2_%5BPS1%5D

PLAYSTATION PORTABLE VERSION HERE = http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4281133/Battle_Arena_Toshinden_1.2_%5BPSP%5D



EDIT: NOTE TO VISTA USERS - THE STREAMING CD AUDIO MAY NOT PLAY! You may have to switch to MIDI music if you want to hear music during gameplay. Vista and Dosbox don't agree, thus producing this CD-DA error. Sorry about this! Will update with a fix when one is discovered.
